content:
entreat

vt. 懇求,乞求
<古>對待,對付

KK [ ɪnˋtrit ]   
vt. 可及物動詞
  •  請求,乞求,【書】懇求

I entreat you to show mercy. 我懇求你發發慈悲。


vi. 不及物動詞
  •  請求
  •  乞求,【書】懇求

v. 動詞
  •  懇求

She was not accustomed to entreat. 她不習慣於乞求於人。


his friends entreated him not to go.
他的朋友們求他別走


The poor mother entreated the teacher 
to forgive her son.
可憐的母親懇求老師原諒她兒子。


They entreated and threatened, 
but all this seemed of no avail.

他們時而懇求, 時而威脅, 
但這一切看來都沒有用。


However much you may entreat him, 
you will get little or nothing.

無論你向他懇求多少, 
你都不會得到什麼東西的。


I entreated your pardon.
我求你原諒。


The murderer entreated the judge for mercy, 
but was sentenced to the gallows.

那個殺人凶手懇求法官寬恕，
但被判處絞刑。
